name: Mantalo
description:
Mantalo is a platformer made in a weekend between friends!
Jump and dash your way in these enchanting levels as you try to beat dangerous druidic exams before the druidic corruption thingy gets you!

How to play

AD / QD / left stick: move
space / A: jump
shift / B: dash

Your Corruption gauge will continuously increase! You must complete various objectives before the Corruption gauge is full, or you'll fail the exam!
You can drink Potions to reduce your Corruption, but they all have side effects which will make your life harder... Be careful!
